^[{-} `r blogdown::shortcode("courseinfo")`] <span class="newthought">This site contains</span> the syllabus and other details for SOCIOL 290S: Visualizing Society, Spring 2019 at Duke University.

The course teaches you the how and why of visualizing sociological (and other) data using modern tools, focused on producing high-quality visualizations in a reproducible way.
